MFImplicitMF MFIMFCreateEdgeIn3SpaceWithRadius (double *o, double *d, double R, MFErrorHandler e)
 Creates a Euclidean line which contains the segment between the points l and r (left and right).

Function Documentation

MFImplicitMF MFIMFCreateEdgeIn3SpaceWithRadius (  double *  o,
double *  d,
double  R,
MFErrorHandler  e
) 
 

Creates a Euclidean line which contains the segment between the points l and r (left and right).

Parameters:
o An array of length at least 3, with the coordinates of the left end point of the interval.
d An array of length at least 3, with the coordinates of the right end point of the interval.
R A radius to use for charts on the manifold.
e A place to return errors.
Returns:
An implicitly defined manifold.
